channel.title: About on unsigned pixel
channel.description: Recent content in About on unsigned pixel

item.title: sidetracked
item.description: Instead of setting up a workflow for automating this blog (see bootstrapping), I decided to use a different theme (casper instead of beautifulhugo) and lost a bit sight of the original goal, so please bear with me…

item.title: About
item.description:
Why unsigned pixel ?

I wanted a somewhat nerdy name, because this site is related to my software development activities. So I used unsigned as a reference to programming and pixel as a reference to digital photography.
